name: Connxtion Featuring Zinx
description:
Hello this is a Game Jam game I made in a week. It's a Physics based Grab and Drop game along with some blasting. It is easy to pick up and play. If a lot of people play it I will update and add more to the adventure. I'm an developer trying hard to go independent. Expect more from Noisy Ether Sakura Games. A donation is welcomed. Please Join my Youtube Page "Noisy Ether Sakura". The whole development of this Game and more can be watched.

Website NESAKURAGAMES.COM

P.S. Forgive the bugs!!
